channel.title: Electronics on Tell Me Aboot
channel.description: Recent content in Electronics on Tell Me Aboot

item.title: Using a Chromecast with an Analog TV
item.description: Using a Chromecast is an excellent, simple and convenient way to watch Netflix, YouTube or even cast your local media to a TV. But what if you only have a spare analog TV lying around? Using a HDMI to Composite converter you can bring that TV back to life for under $25!
